Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2009 01:03AM CarolynSmith wrote: EHG, I am on Taxotere/Carboplatin/Herceptin.  I am beginning to think I have had just about every allergic reaction I can have and sometimes it is discouraging.  The latest Taxotere reactions were blistering of my hands and feet and a sudden, two day fluid retention of 13 pounds.  Last weekend, 10 days after my last treatment was when I began to blow up like the newest Macy's Day Parade balloon.  I already had an appointment for Monday morning for Herceptin and when the doctor saw me he said that for the second week in a row it was not safe to have the Herceptin because of the reactions I am having to the Taxotere.  I was put on a diuretic and about half the fluid has come off this week.  He also feels like we are going to have to space out the chemo farther than every 21 days to give my body a chance to re-build.  I am not giving up, and don't you either!  Carolyn
Posts.Title: Taxol vs Taxotere pep671 PositivityRocks
